conbody.p: Before attempting start up, thoroughly study and familiarize yourself with the exact sequence of operation (see ). Ensure the water heater is properly grounded. Flame sensing requires an adequate earth ground. If the water heater is not properly grounded it will cause ignition failure.
Be certain that the water heater is full of water, that air is purged from the gas and water lines, and that there are no leaks in the gas and water lines. Ensure all inlet water valves are open.
